turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Le Plessis-Trévise.
turn.2: Le Plessis-Trévise Le Plessis-Trévise is a commune in the eastern suburbs of Paris, France.
turn.4: It is located from the center of Paris.
turn.6: The commune of Le Plessis-Trévise was created on 7 July 1899 by detaching a part of the territory of La Queue-en-Brie and merging it with a part of the territory of Chennevières-sur-Marne and a part of the territory of Villiers-sur-Marne.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: Le Plessis-Trévise is served by no station of the Paris Métro, RER, or suburban rail network.
turn.9: Do they serve any nearby stations?
turn.10: The closest station to Le Plessis-Trévise is Villiers-sur-Marne – Le Plessis-Trévise station on Paris RER line E. This station is located in the neighboring commune of Villiers-sur-Marne, from the town center of Le Plessis-Trévise.
turn.11: What schools are in the area?
turn.12: Schools in the commune include: The senior high school/sixth-form college Lycée Champlain in Chennevières-sur-Marne serves Le Plessis-Trévise.
